title: Create Descriptive Summaries of Datasets
text: goal dfsummary make descriptive summries datasets, person-sensitive information automatically masked. contrast packages, eg excellent gtsummary package, package aim provide presentation-ready tables, instead focuses keeping things simple relying data.table package efficient summarization. summarized data returned simple data.table user can finalize table using eg gt flextable package.

Summarize variable — .summarize_var
text: Returns descriptive summary variable data.frame.

title: Summarize variable — .summarize_var
code: .summarize_var(   x,   var,   type = NULL,   weight = NULL,   by = NULL,   by_total_val = ".all" )

title: Summarize variable — .summarize_var
text: x Input data.frame. var String. Name variable x summarize. type String. Variable type var: "bin" (binary), "cont" (continuous), "cat" (categorical). Default NULL, meaning type var automatically deduced data. weight String. Optional name variable x contains observation weights. weights must non-negative numbers. String. Optional name variable summarize . by_total_val String. Name given overall -group.

title: Summarize variable — .summarize_var
text: data.table containing descriptive summary var.

what: Summarize variables in a data.frame — summarize_df
title: Summarize variables in a data.frame — summarize_df
text: Returns descriptive summary variables data.frame.

title: Summarize variables in a data.frame — summarize_df
code: summarize_df(   x,   vars,   types = NULL,   weight = NULL,   by = NULL,   by_total_val = ".all" )

title: Summarize variables in a data.frame — summarize_df
text: x Input data.frame. vars Character vector. Names variables x summarize. types Optional named character vector. Variable types variabls vars: "bin" (binary), "cont" (continuous), "cat" (categorical). Default NULL, meaning types vars automatically deduced data. Can specified variables, implicitly setting type remaining variables NULL. weight String. Optional name variable x contains observation weights. weights must non-negative numbers. String. Optional name variable summarize . by_total_val String. Name given overall -group.

title: Summarize variables in a data.frame — summarize_df
text: data.table containing descriptive summary vars.

title: Summarize variables in a data.frame — summarize_df
code: x <- data.frame(var1 = 1:10, var2 = c(rep("A", 5), rep("B", 5))) summarize_df(   x,   vars = c("var1", "var2"),   types = c(var1 = "cont", var2 = "cat") ) #>     .by .var_name .var_type .n_by_level .var_level .n_var_level .sum .stddev #> 1: .all      var1      cont          10                      10   55 3.02765 #> 2: .all      var2       cat          10          A            5    5 0.00000 #> 3: .all      var2       cat          10          B            5    5 0.00000 #>    .p25 .p50 .p75 #> 1: 3.25  5.5 7.75 #> 2: 1.00  1.0 1.00 #> 3: 1.00  1.0 1.00
